titleStmt.title: The cunning age, or, A re-married woman repenting her marriage, rehearsing her husbands dishonest carriage being a pleasant dialogue between a re-married woman, a widdow, and a young wife : to the tune of The wiuing age.
titleStmt.author: Cart, John.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Cart by STC (2nd ed.).
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
